p:
39 derivatives of Imidazolones connected to chalone moiety with anti-proliferative activities (IC 50) on MCF-7 cancer cell lines were obtained from (Abo-Elanwar et al. 2019) writings. The anti-proliferative activities were measured in inhibitory concentration (IC 50) and then converted to the logarithm scale (pIC 50). The tabulated form of the IC 50 is measured in concentration of micromolar (μM) and the pIC 50 is shown in Table 1.
